meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snotty.
meanings.sent1: Her constant snottinesses made it hard to be around her.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the snottinesses of some people.
meanings.sent3: The snottinesses of the spoiled child was both annoying and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The snottinesses of the cat, turning up its nose at everything, was quite comical.
meanings.sent5: The snottinesses of the queen bee made her unpopular among the other insects.

meanings.definition: The act of behaving in a snotty manner.
meanings.sent1: His snottinesses towards the waiter were uncalled for.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her snottinesses by ignoring everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: The snottinesses of the toddler, refusing to share his toys, was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The snottinesses of the politician, looking down on the common people, was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The snottinesses of the celebrity made them unpopular with their fans.
